cf.Field.sample_size¶

Field.sample_size()[source]¶

The number of non-missing data elements in the data array.

Returns a scalar cf.Data object.

f.sample_size() is equivalent to f.data.sample_size(squeeze=True).

New in version 1.0.

See also

cf.Data.sample_size, max, mean, mid_range, min, range, sd, sum, var

Examples: 
>>> f.sample_size()
<CF Data: 7008.0>
